statements: SELECT payment_id, card_number FROM wallet_payments;
SELECT * FROM wallet_payments WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT card_holder_name, expiration_date, cvv FROM wallet_payments WHERE card_number LIKE '1234%';
SELECT DISTINCT card_number FROM wallet_payments ORDER BY expiration_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_payments WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY payment_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_payments WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT payment_id, card_number FROM wallet_payments WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT payment_id, card_holder_name, cvv FROM wallet_payments WHERE card_number LIKE '%1234%';
SELECT card_holder_name, expiration_date FROM wallet_payments WHERE cvv = '123';
SELECT * FROM wallet_payments WHERE encrypted_card_info IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM payment_cards;
SELECT card_number, card_holder FROM payment_cards ORDER BY card_holder ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, status FROM transactions WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_cards WHERE expiration_date <= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM payment_cards WHERE card_holder = 'John Doe';
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_cards WHERE id = '5d98c82f-0092-4a2f-bfc9-64977767deee';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM transactions WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT card_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions JOIN payment_cards ON transactions.card_id = payment_cards.id;
SELECT * FROM payment_cards ORDER BY card_holder_name DESC;
SELECT card_id, card_holder_name, expiry_date FROM payment_cards WHERE cvv = 123;
SELECT MAX(amount) FROM transactions;
SELECT card_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY card_id HAVING total_amount > 500;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM payment_cards WHERE card_holder_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT card_id, card_holder_name, expiry_date FROM payment_cards WHERE card_id > 100 ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT pc.card_holder_name, t.amount, t.transaction_date FROM transactions t LEFT JOIN payment_cards pc ON t.card_id = pc.card_id WHERE t.amount > 100 ORDER BY t.transaction_date ASC;
SELECT u.username, u.email, COUNT(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM users u LEFT JOIN transactions t ON u.user_id = t.card_id GROUP BY u.username, u.email HAVING total_transactions >= 5;

SELECT pc.card_holder_name, count(t.transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM payment_cards pc LEFT JOIN transactions t ON pc.card_id = t.card_id WHERE pc.card_holder_name LIKE 'A%' GROUP BY pc.card_holder_name HAVING count(t.transaction_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_transactions DESC;
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT card_number, expiration_date FROM payment_cards WHERE cvv = '123';
SELECT amount, timestamp FROM transactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallets ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT user_id, card_number FROM payment_cards WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM wallets ORDER BY balance DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT card_id, card_number, expiry_date FROM cards WHERE card_number LIKE '1234%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, timestamp FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT wallet_id, user_id, balance FROM wallets WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT card_number, expiry_date FROM cards WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM transactions WHERE user_id = 3 GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, balance FROM wallets WHERE balance > 100 ORDER BY balance DESC, user_id ASC;
